parameters.name: FantasyLeagueID
parameters.description: The fantasy league ID

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: An optional filter for minimum timestamp

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: An optional filter for maximum timestamp

parameters.name: matchid
parameters.description: An optional filter for a specific match

parameters.name: SeriesID
parameters.description: An optional filter for a specific series

parameters.name: PlayerAccountID
parameters.description: An optional filter for a specific player

parameters.name: accountid
parameters.description: The account ID to look up

parameters.name: league_id
parameters.description: Only show matches of the specified league id

parameters.name: match_id
parameters.description: Only show matches of the specified match id

parameters.name: match_id
parameters.description: Match id

parameters.name: hero_id
parameters.description: The ID of the hero that must be in the matches being queried

parameters.name: game_mode
parameters.description: Which game mode to return matches for

parameters.name: skill
parameters.description: The average skill range of the match, these can be [1-3] with lower numbers being lower skill. Ignored if an account ID is specified

parameters.name: min_players
parameters.description: Minimum number of human players that must be in a match for it to be returned

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: An account ID to get matches from. This will fail if the user has their match history hidden

parameters.name: league_id
parameters.description: The league ID to return games from

parameters.name: start_at_match_id
parameters.description: The minimum match ID to start from

parameters.name: matches_requested
parameters.description: The number of requested matches to return

parameters.name: tournament_games_only
parameters.description: Whether or not tournament games should only be returned

parameters.name: date_min
parameters.description: The starting time stamp to collect scheduled games from. If ignored, it will use the current time

parameters.name: date_max
parameters.description: The ending time stamp. If this is more than 7 days past the starting time stamp, it will be clamped to 7 days.

parameters.name: eventid
parameters.description: The League ID of the compendium you're looking for.

parameters.description: The account ID to look up.

parameters.description: Should be a 32 byte random blob of data, which is then encrypted with RSA using the Steam system's public key.  Randomness is important here for security.

parameters.name: encrypted_loginkey
parameters.description: Should be the users hashed loginkey, AES encrypted with the sessionkey.

methods.name: GetAccountList
methods.description: Gets a list of game server accounts with their logon tokens

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

methods.name: CreateAccount
methods.description: Creates a persistent game server account

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: The app to use the account for

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: The memo to set on the new account

methods.name: SetMemo
methods.description: This method changes the memo associated with the game server account. Memos do not affect the account in any way. The memo shows up in the GetAccountList response and serves only as a reminder of what the account is used for.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The SteamID of the game server to set the memo on

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: The memo to set on the new account

methods.name: ResetLoginToken
methods.description: Generates a new login token for the specified game server

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The SteamID of the game server to reset the login token of

methods.name: GetAccountPublicInfo
methods.description: Gets public information about a given game server account

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The SteamID of the game server to get info on

methods.name: GetServerSteamIDsByIP
methods.description: Gets a list of server SteamIDs given a list of IPs

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

methods.name: GetServerIPsBySteamID
methods.description: Gets a list of server IP addresses given a list of SteamIDs

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

methods.name: QueryFiles
methods.description: Performs a search query for published files

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: query_type
parameters.description: enumeration EPublishedFileQueryType in clientenums.h

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page

parameters.name: numperpage
parameters.description: (Optional) The number of results, per page to return.

parameters.name: creator_appid
parameters.description: App that created the files

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App that consumes the files

parameters.name: requiredtags
parameters.description: Tags to match on. See match_all_tags parameter below

parameters.name: excludedtags
parameters.description: (Optional) Tags that must NOT be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: match_all_tags
parameters.description: If true, then items must have all the tags specified, otherwise they must have at least one of the tags.

parameters.name: required_flags
parameters.description: Required flags that must be set on any returned items

parameters.name: omitted_flags
parameters.description: Flags that must not be set on any returned items

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Text to match in the item's title or description

parameters.name: filetype
parameters.description: EPublishedFileInfoMatchingFileType

parameters.name: child_publishedfileid
parameters.description: Find all items that reference the given item.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: If query_type is k_PublishedFileQueryType_RankedByTrend, then this is the number of days to get votes for [1,7].

parameters.name: include_recent_votes_only
parameters.description: If query_type is k_PublishedFileQueryType_RankedByTrend, then limit result set just to items that have votes within the day range given

parameters.name: totalonly
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, only return the total number of files that satisfy this query.

parameters.name: return_vote_data
parameters.description: Return vote data

parameters.name: return_tags
parameters.description: Return tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_kv_tags
parameters.description: Return key-value tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_previews
parameters.description: Return preview image and video details in the file details

parameters.name: return_children
parameters.description: Return child item ids in the file details

parameters.name: return_short_description
parameters.description: Populate the short_description field instead of file_description

methods.name: GetRecentlyPlayedGames
methods.description: Gets information about a player's recently played games

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The player we're asking about

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of games to return (0/unset: all)

methods.name: GetOwnedGames
methods.description: Return a list of games owned by the player

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The player we're asking about

parameters.name: include_appinfo
parameters.description: true if we want additional details (name, icon) about each game

parameters.name: include_played_free_games
parameters.description: Free games are excluded by default.  If this is set, free games the user has played will be returned.

parameters.name: appids_filter
parameters.description: if set, restricts result set to the passed in apps

methods.description: Returns the Steam Level of a user

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The player we're asking about

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The player we're asking about

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The player we're asking about

parameters.name: badgeid
parameters.description: The badge we're asking about

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The player we're asking about

parameters.name: appid_playing
parameters.description: The game player is currently playing

methods.name: GetTradeOffers
methods.description: Get a list of sent or received trade offers

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: get_sent_offers
parameters.description: Request the list of sent offers.

parameters.name: get_received_offers
parameters.description: Request the list of received offers.

parameters.name: get_descriptions
parameters.description: If set, the item display data for the items included in the returned trade offers will also be returned.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language to use when loading item display data.

parameters.name: active_only
parameters.description: Indicates we should only return offers which are still active, or offers that have changed in state since the time_historical_cutoff

parameters.name: historical_only
parameters.description: Indicates we should only return offers which are not active.

parameters.name: time_historical_cutoff
parameters.description: When active_only is set, offers updated since this time will also be returned

methods.name: GetTradeOffer
methods.description: Gets a specific trade offer

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

methods.name: GetTradeOffersSummary
methods.description: Get counts of pending and new trade offers

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

parameters.name: time_last_visit
parameters.description: The time the user last visited.  If not passed, will use the time the user last visited the trade offer page.

methods.name: DeclineTradeOffer
methods.description: Decline a trade offer someone sent to us

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

methods.name: CancelTradeOffer
methods.description: Cancel a trade offer we sent

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Access key

methods.description: Send account recovery data

methods.description: Send account recovery data
